item.title: Format Dates in Flutter
item.description: The article from geeksforgeeks The Dart in-built method, for formatting, dates in Flutter according to the requirements is very limited and restrictive. While dealing with dates it should be in human-readable format but unfortunately, thereâ€™s no way of formatting dates in flutter unless you make use of a third-party package. In this article, we will look into one such package known as the intl package. intl package Using intl package Add the following dependencies to your pubspec.
